name: Shooting Fotball
description:
This is my submission for Mix And Game Jam 2020. 

In this game you play as a goalkeeper and you must protect your goal and shoot the balls with your gun.

This game is combination of two genres : Shooter and Sport.

Bg Music is created by aiva.com

How to play :

Move player with A and D.

Aim with mouse and shoot with left click.

Have Fun!
